name: Start Making Sense: A Perspective on Practical Design
description:
My talk at the Figma Athens meetup - July 10, 2020. Click the ❤️ if you enjoyed and reach out (@adispezio) if you have any questions! I've included a couple tips in the file on the parallax transition and blended gif effects for those interested!

Thanks to Socrates Charisis and the Figma Athens group along with my co-presenters, Alex Price and Joel Grenier!

Thanks to @alexeinars for the Monument Valley Figma kit!  
https://www.figma.com/community/file/843899381761366385
